blog.name: scammychan
blog.title: Scammy-chan Productions
blog.description:
This is a personal blog where I post whatever the hell I feel like posting.
Sometimes it'll be an update to one of the fics I'm writing. Sometimes it'll be fanart (that's a lot less likely). Sometimes, it'll even be me venting because of a bunch of bullshit that happened.
But mostly, it's just stuff I really like.

summary: Felt like drawing something cute last night and asked a friend for a Pokemon suggestion. She didn't actually answer in time but...
caption:
Felt like drawing something cute last night and asked a friend for a Pokemon suggestion. She didn’t actually answer in time but immediately after messaging her I realized she’d probably say shinx.
I don’t remember when the last time I did a full pencil drawing was.

reblog.comment:

tags: He looks like a suburban dad that says he works out at the high classy snobby luncheon
but really he kills people on the side of his white collar job
He brings a mean hummus and won't say where he got the recipe
Katherine once witnessed him murder some black berry vines on the hill outside his house with such artful and deadly expertise it both
aroused and frightened her she drank extra wine that night and never shared the experience
it was the most exciting thing she'd experienced since agreeing to stay home and take care of the kids
she considers a life of crime as a vapid fantasy
At the next homeowners meeting for the neighborhood she asks for the hummus recipe

summary: I was thinking, and I just want to say that this point i’m glad Ash’s Pikachu hasn’t evolved, largely because Raichu is even...
body:
I was thinking, and I just want to say that this point i’m glad Ash’s Pikachu hasn’t evolved, largely because Raichu is even more incompatible with the whole “Ash has to be reset and can’t win leagues” thing the anime does.

Like at least with Pikachu, even when it’s suddenly weaker, you can semi-rationalize that “well, it is just a Pikachu after all”, even though it is kinda frustrating.

But with Raichu, there would be way less of an excuse whenever it’s suddenly weaker than before, any plot device to make it weaker would feel even more forced, and you’d just be left wondering what the point of evolving it even was if sometimes it gets nerfed just like before.

And on the other end, the average strength and competence of Ash’s opponents would have to increase, or Raichu would have to be reserved for bigger fights, just so it doesn’t steamroll everything up until the region’s endgame… because if you keep the opposition’s power level about the same, but Raichu *can’t* just steamroll everything , you’d just be left with the previous issue.

Basically, Raichu would only be a viable option if the anime also changed a lot of things about how its progression goes, because evolving would pretty much force Pikachu to be a lot stronger at all times for the sake of logic.

trail.content:

Like at least with Pikachu, even when it’s suddenly weaker, you can semi-rationalize that “well, it is just a Pikachu after all”, even though it is kinda frustrating.

But with Raichu, there would be way less of an excuse whenever it’s suddenly weaker than before, any plot device to make it weaker would feel even more forced, and you’d just be left wondering what the point of evolving it even was if sometimes it gets nerfed just like before.

And on the other end, the average strength and competence of Ash’s opponents would have to increase, or Raichu would have to be reserved for bigger fights, just so it doesn’t steamroll everything up until the region’s endgame… because if you keep the opposition’s power level about the same, but Raichu *can’t* just steamroll everything , you’d just be left with the previous issue.

Basically, Raichu would only be a viable option if the anime also changed a lot of things about how its progression goes, because evolving would pretty much force Pikachu to be a lot stronger at all times for the sake of logic.
